title: Combat Wrench
summaries: The Combat Wrench is a boomerang which has a 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance of being dropped by the Mechanic. It will pierce multiple targets before returning.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Tooltip: 'For fixing things, and breaking them'
statistics.Sell: 50
